name: specif-viewer
description: An app for your web-browser to view, edit and transform system specifications.

scripts.open_browser_macos: shx open ./build/views/view.html || echo 'Could not open Safari browser. Please open ./build/view.html manually.'
scripts.open_browser_linux: shx xdg-open ./build/views/view.html || echo 'Could not open XDG browser. Please open ./build/view.html manually.'
scripts.open_browser_win: explorer 'build\views\view.html' || echo 'Could not open default browser. Please open ./build/view.html manually.'
scripts._postbuild: npm run _copy_assets_folder & npm run _copy_config_folder & npm run _copy_apps
scripts._copy_assets_folder: shx mkdir ./build/vendor/ & shx mkdir ./build/vendor/assets/ & shx cp -R ./src/vendor/assets ./build/vendor/
